name: bloodied note
description:
# Bloodied Note

*The parchment is stained with dark splotches, its edges frayed and torn. The handwriting becomes increasingly erratic as it progresses.*

To those who would judge me,

I, Alaric Shadowmere, once proprietor of the Whispering Raven Inn, pen this final testament. Let it serve as both confession and vindication for the deeds that have brought me to this wretched state.

For years, I welcomed weary travelers, offering respite from the horrors that roam our blighted lands. But with each passing season, I bore witness to the futility of it all. The weak perish, the strong exploit, and death claims us all in the end.

It was then that the whispers began. The ancient tomes hidden beneath the floorboards of my cellar spoke of power beyond mortal ken. They promised a way to conquer death itself, to build an army that would never tire, never falter.

And so, I began my great work.

Each patron who crossed my threshold became more than a guest – they became raw material for my grand design. Their flesh, their bones, their very essence – all repurposed in service of a greater cause.

Do you not see the beauty in it? The drunkard who squandered his life now stands eternal guard. The abusive merchant now toils without rest or reward. I have given them purpose beyond their petty lives!

But the fools outside do not understand. They call me monster, madman, murderer. They cannot comprehend the magnitude of my vision.

As I write this, I hear them coming. The villagers, the so-called heroes, all clamoring for my head. Let them come. My children – my beautiful, rotting children – will greet them.

And should I fall, know this: Death is but a doorway. I have peered beyond its threshold, and I fear it no longer. In time, you too will understand the gift I offered this miserable world.

May HE embrace us all.

*The signature at the bottom is a smeared, illegible scrawl*
